comments:
Build ID: I20060602-1317

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Try to install the attached feature using the update manager. 
Result: the feature will fail to install.

This feature uses a custom install handler's configure API to add progress to the progress bar, but since no progress monitor is passed into the initialize API during the configure stage (moitor is null), the installtion/configuration of the feature fails.



More information:
Created an attachment (id=55440)
update site w/feature

Created an attachment (id=55441)
Install Handler used in feature

Exception thrown:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2006-12-11 17:19:10.144
!MESSAGE Unable to create custom install handler for feature "Progress Feature". [null argument:]
!STACK 0

	at my.test.installhandlers.ProgressTestHandler.initialize(ProgressTestHandler.java:105)
